posts.post_content:
This is a great start on a 1910 Obak collection. There are 59 different 1910s, two of which, N. Brashear and Castleton, are 150 Subjects backs, plus three different 1911.

I conservatively grade the 1910s as 15 Poor, 23 Fair, 11 Good and 10 Very Good.

They are grouped by condition in the scans.

The whole lot is available for $250, delivered.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=101185&d=1370029061[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=101186&d=1370029074[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=101187&d=1370029086[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=101188&d=1370029097[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=101189&d=1370029109[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=101190&d=1370029124[/IMG]

I'll take them!

Email to follow.

Mac

I'll take them too!

(Nice pickup Mac)

Rob

Is it too late to bid?  

Just kidding!  Nice pick-up Mac.
I wish...too late even for me.

Wow...wish I had seen this too...:mad:

Bob...any other lots like that...t205s perhaps :D

Joshua
